title: ColorRings Watch Face
summary: Casual interactive Watch Face for active lifestyle with advanced customization.
description: ColorRings - interactive casual analog watch face for your Android Wear device that provides new and higher interactivity level. Allows to set colors and customize configuration of the clock directly on the smart watch. Also free color selection available from your smartphone. Rich set of the widgets and advanced customization features allow to create number of perfect watch faces according to your taste.  Works on Moto 360, Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Wear devices. Looks great on both round and square displays. Key features:✔ Customization directly by tap.✔ 2 styles of background✔ 2 styles of clock hands✔ Date✔ Day of the week.✔ Watch battery level.✔ Phone battery level.✔ Calendar events✔ Stopwatch✔ Timer✔ Second time zone✔ Unread SMS and Missed calls✔ Popup panel with missed calls list and unread sms reader.✔ Heart rate✔ Temperature (Celcius/Fahrenheit)✔ Weather icon.✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer .✔ Smooth seconds.✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.✔ Colors and widgets customization directly on smart watch.Settings:✔ Select color (free color selection)✔ Set screen timeout✔ Set design for line for seconds✔ Enable/disable of using main theme in ambient mode.✔ Select weather update period✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)✔ Set second time zoneTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  ColorRings Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.Common Synchronization problem & solution.If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'- uninstall the watch face- disconnect watch from phone- restart your watch device- reconnect watch and phone- install the ColorRings watch face once againIn case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
descriptionHTML:
ColorRings - interactive casual analog watch face for your Android Wear device that provides new and higher interactivity level. Allows to set colors and customize configuration of the clock directly on the smart watch. Also free color selection available from your smartphone. Rich set of the widgets and advanced customization features allow to create number of perfect watch faces according to your taste.
Works on Moto 360, Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Wear devices. Looks great on both round and square displays.

Key features:

✔ Customization directly by tap.
✔ 2 styles of background
✔ 2 styles of clock hands
✔ Date
✔ Day of the week.
✔ Watch battery level.
✔ Phone battery level.
✔ Calendar events
✔ Stopwatch
✔ Timer
✔ Second time zone
✔ Unread SMS and Missed calls
✔ Popup panel with missed calls list and unread sms reader.
✔ Heart rate
✔ Temperature (Celcius/Fahrenheit)
✔ Weather icon.
✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.
✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer .
✔ Smooth seconds.
✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.
✔ Colors and widgets customization directly on smart watch.


Settings:
✔ Select color (free color selection)
✔ Set screen timeout
✔ Set design for line for seconds
✔ Enable/disable of using main theme in ambient mode.
✔ Select weather update period
✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)
✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)
✔ Set second time zone

To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose ColorRings Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.

Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.

Common Synchronization problem & solution.
If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:
- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'
- uninstall the watch face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart your watch device
- reconnect watch and phone
- install the ColorRings watch face once again

In case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
comments: When first installed, it was crashing on the watch pretty much all the time. Sent a bug report to the developers and within a couple of days a fixed version was released.  Running for a week or more now, no issues.  Nice clean watch face with ability to customise quite easily, I like it.
Nice in general, longer hours and minutes hands and it will be perfect
Very cool I really like this. How often does it check heartbeat? Be nice if it had date on ambient too. Pedometer should sync with what's on watch as more accurate than on phone. Cool though!

Really cool watchface Customization is awesome. Developer obviously put a lot of work into the options and the ease of using them. Don't let the lack of reviews deter you - get this out and you won't be disappointed!
recentChanges: ✔ New configuration panel to manage widgets and watch faces color
✔ Fixed issue with second time zone label
✔ Fixed minor issues in element positions on some watches
